recommendations: Richard Merrill, MBA
Director, Brand and Consumer Marketing
August 1, 2013, Richard reported directly to Amy

Amy was one of my first managers back when I started my career with J. Walter Thompson.  Amy interviewed me for a position under her supervision in the Phoenix office of which she directed.  From the start, I knew this was a person I could trust.  She is a person that exemplifies high moral and ethical standards, while empowering and motivating her employees along the way.  Amy is the type of manager that you want to work hard for; a person that you can stick by and be loyal to.  Amy fights for what she believes in and iis a patient teacher who always exposed me to important information, clients, and meetings. I have learned many valuable lessons from Amy that I still carry with me to this day:  Setting goals and establishing a plan to achieve them, believing in yourself and finding the positive in situations, being ok with making mistakes as long as you learn and grow, and lastly, being a resource to others on your team who may need help.               I would not be where I am today, and where I am headed tomorrow, if it weren’t for Amy’s continued guidance.
Richard Merrill, MBA

Amy is a valuable, strategic partner who will make a difference for your business.  Her solutions orientation combined with her intellectual and creative mind set her apart from her peers.  She has exceptional expertise in both digital marketing and brand advertising.  Equally impressive is her ability to energize a team, lead in ambiguity and advance projects.  Amy will be an asset to your organization.

Laura McLaughlin
Experienced marketing professional who delivers impactful results
November 11, 2016, Amy managed Laura directly

Laura was promoted from the San Francisco office to run her own dealer group under my supervision in Phoenix, and I could not have been happier with her performance. She was eager to jump right in with little guidance. The dealers took to her right away and it made the transition easier on me, allowing me to focus on other accounts. Laura has a strong work ethic and brings enthusiasm to the workplace every day; anyone would be lucky to have her on their team.

summary: Driven marketing professional with proven performance in brand management and advertising.  Sustained career advancement from achievements in account management, creative production, promotion implementation, sponsorship negotiations and client relation. Experienced at project management from strategic vision to hands-on implementation.  Proficient in team building, strategic partnership, and communication with subordinates, and executive management.
